name: GenYus 2000
description:
Made during Fatec SCS Game Jam 2021

Feito na Fatec SCS Game Jam 2021

Tema "Cringe"
E-T (electronic Mr. T) deve evitar que as criaturas cringe dominem seu cyber-espaço futurista

E-T (electronic Mr. T) must stop cringe creatures from taking the futuristic cyber-space away

Projeto com:

Dani Stob - Sound Designer

Flutu Music - Trilha Sonora

Logan Quasar https://loganquasar.itch.io/ - Character Concept

Lucas Ferres - Programação

Renato Eike https://renatoeike.itch.io/ - Game Design
